20101204024751.000|20101204024752.250|CCO|>>> ONE NOTE I SHOULD MENTION ON
20101204024752.250|20101204024753.500|CCO|THE FOOD SAFETY BILL I 
20101204024753.500|20101204024754.750|CCO|DESCRIBED, I DESCRIBED IT AS 
20101204024754.750|20101204024756.000|CCO|HAVING PASSED.
20101204024756.000|20101204024757.250|CCO|WHAT HAPPENED HERE IS IT PASSED 
20101204024757.250|20101204024758.500|CCO|THE HOUSE, AND THEN IT PASSED 
20101204024758.500|20101204024759.750|CCO|THE SENATE.
20101204024759.750|20101204024801.000|CCO|AND WHEN TWO THINGS PASS THE 
20101204024801.000|20101204024802.111|CCO|HOUSE AND SENATE, REMEMBER THE 
20101204024802.111|20101204024803.222|CCO|WHOLE CONJUNCTION JUNCTION 
20101204024803.222|20101204024804.333|CCO|THING, RIGHT?

20101204024805.444|20101204024806.556|CCO|HILL?
